author: Inforum
title: Ground News - MARCH STORM: A major winter storm is taking aim at the region
text:
Summary by Inforum FARGO 10 p.m., Thursday, March 21: A major winter storm appears to be headed to Minnesota and North Dakota, with snow developing sometime Sunday.The snow will likely be light at first, but it appears ready to linger over the region into Tuesday morning, creating the potential for heavy snow accumulations across the region. Wind strong enough for blowing and drifting snow looks likely by Sunday night or Monday, possibly lasting into Tuesday. As … Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
